field.name: ma_dvcs
field.check: ma_dvcs not in (select ma_dvcs from dmdvcs) ⩓exists(select 1 from #unit b where @@table.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and @@table.so_ct = b.so_ct having count(b.ma_dvcs) > 1)⩓ma_dvcs not in (select distinct ma_dvcs from sysunitrights where user_id = @user and r_new = 1)

field.name: ma_tn
field.check: ma_tn not in (select ma_tn from vtdmtn where loai = '1' and kieu_thue='2')

field.name: ma_nt
field.check: ma_nt not in (select ma_nt from dmnt)

field.name: ma_ns
field.check: ma_ns not in (select ma_ns from phns where ((@@table.ma_dvcs = '' and ma_dvcs = @ma_dvcs) or (ma_dvcs = @@table.ma_dvcs)))

processing.text: &CheckVoucherRightBeforeProcess; declare @q nvarchar(4000), @duplicate nvarchar(512), @locked nvarchar(512), @field varchar(32), @wsID varchar(8), @voucherID varchar(8) declare @master varchar(16), @detail varchar(16), @inquiry varchar(16), @general varchar(16), @baseCurrency varchar(8), @datetime0 char(21), @d0 datetime declare @user int, @admin bit, @r int, @m int, @y int, @max1 int, @count int, @roundAmount int select @d0 = getdate(), @datetime0 = convert(char(8), @d0, 112) + ' ' + convert(char(12), @d0, 114), @status = left(replace(@status, '''', '') , 1) select @admin = @@admin, @user = @@userID, @master = 'm&Detail;$', @detail = 'd&Detail;$', @inquiry = 'i&Detail;$', @general = 'c&Detail;$000000', @voucherID = '&Code;' select @locked = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Đã khóa số liệu, kiểm tra lại ngày chứng từ tại dòng %s.' else N'Data is locked, please check the date of voucher at row %s.' end select @duplicate = case when @@language = 'v' then N'&s1; đã tồn tại.' else '&s2; already exists.' end select @wsID = rtrim(val) from options where name = 'm_ws_id' select @baseCurrency = rtrim(val) from options where name = 'm_ma_nt0' select @roundAmount = cast(rtrim(val) as int) from options where name = 'm_round_tien' select @max1 = character_maximum_length from information_schema.columns where table_name = @master + '000000' and column_name = 'so_ct' -- Update update @@table set so_ct = space(@max1 - len(rtrim(ltrim(so_ct)))) + rtrim(ltrim(so_ct)), ma_nt = case when ma_nt <> '' then ma_nt else @baseCurrency end &ImportOverwriteData; -- Checking if @check$Unit <> '1' begin if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'so_ct', stt, 'C001' from @@table a join c&Detail;$000000 b on a.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = b.so_ct&ImportSqlWhere;&ImportOverwriteCheckKey; &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @r = min(stt) from @@table a join c&Detail;$000000 b on a.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = b.so_ct&ImportSqlWhere;&ImportOverwriteCheckKey; if @r is not null begin select replace(replace(replace(@duplicate, '%s1', so_ct), '%s2', convert(varchar(12), cast(ngay_ct as smalldatetime), 103)), '%s3', @@delta + @r) as message from @@table where stt = @r return end end end select top 0 ma_dvcs, ngay_ct, so_ct, cast(0 as int) as id into #unit from m&Detail;$000000 insert into #unit select ma_dvcs, ngay_ct, so_ct, min(stt) from @@table group by ma_dvcs, ngay_ct, so_ct -- Checking if @check$Unit = '1' begin if @$mode = 1 begin select ma_dvcs, ngay_ct, so_ct, stt as id into #unitmode from @@table &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'so_ct', id, 'C002' from #unitmode a join c&Detail;$000000 b on a.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = b.so_ct and a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs&ImportSqlWhere;&ImportOverwriteCheckKey; &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @r = min(id) from #unit a join c&Detail;$000000 b on a.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = b.so_ct and a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs&ImportSqlWhere;&ImportOverwriteCheckKey; if @r is not null begin select replace(replace(replace(replace(@duplicate$Unit, '%s1', so_ct), '%s2', convert(varchar(12), cast(ngay_ct as smalldatetime), 103)), '%s3', rtrim(ma_dvcs)), '%s4', @@delta + @r) as message from #unit where id = @r return end end end -- Locked Date &ImportLockedDateCheck; -- Check @@checking(1); @@checking(2); &ConfigDynamicImportChecking; &ImportOverwriteChecking; &EndErrorMode; -- Gather select top 0 stt_rec, ngay_ct, so_ct, cast(0 as int) as stt, identity(int, 1, 1) as id into #id from m&Detail;$000000 insert into #id(stt_rec, ngay_ct, so_ct, stt) select '', a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct, min(a.stt) from @@table a &ImportOverwriteIdentiyDataCondition; group by a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct order by a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct select identity(int, 1, 1) as id, cast(stt as int) as stt, convert(varchar(8), ngay_ct, 112) + so_ct as c, cast(0 as int) as ln into #ln from @@table order by ngay_ct, so_ct, stt exec AI_ERP$App$UpdateLineNumber create index i on #ln(stt) select @count = count(*) from #id exec AI_ERP$App$UpdateIdentityNumber @wsID, @voucherID, @count, @@userID &ImportOverwriteProcess; select top 0 stt_rec, stt_rec0, line_nbr, ngay_ct, so_ct, ma_ns, tn_ct_nt, tn_ct, tien_gt_nt, tien_gt, tn_tt_nt, tn_tt, thue_nt, thue, thue_giam_nt, thue_giam, ma_ck, so_luong, cast('' as char(1)) as tinh_thue_yn, cast(0 as int) as stt into #d&Detail; from d&Detail;$000000 insert into #d&Detail; select b.stt_rec, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$Voucher$GetRecordsGroup(i.ln), i.ln, a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct, a.ma_ns, a.tn_ct_nt, round(a.tn_ct_nt * a.ty_gia, @roundAmount), a.tien_gt_nt, round(a.tien_gt_nt * a.ty_gia, @roundAmount), a.tn_tt_nt, round(a.tn_tt_nt * a.ty_gia, @roundAmount), a.thue_nt, round(a.thue_nt * a.ty_gia, @roundAmount), a.thue_giam_nt, round(a.thue_giam_nt * a.ty_gia, @roundAmount), a.ma_ck, a.so_luong, e.tinh_thue_yn, a.stt from @@table a join #id b on a.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = b.so_ct join #ln i on a.stt = i.stt join phns e on a.ma_ns = e.ma_ns order by a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct, a.stt select top 0 stt_rec, status, ma_dvcs, ngay_ct, so_ct, ma_tn, ma_thue, thue_suat, ma_nt, ty_gia, t_tn_ct_nt, t_tn_ct, t_tien_gt_nt, t_tien_gt, t_tn_tt_nt, t_tn_tt, t_thue_nt, t_thue, t_thue_giam_nt, t_thue_giam, dien_giai into #m&Detail; from m&Detail;$000000 insert into #m&Detail; select b.stt_rec, @status, c.ma_dvcs, a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct, a.ma_tn, '', 0, a.ma_nt, a.ty_gia, d.t_tn_ct_nt, d.t_tn_ct, d.t_tien_gt_nt, d.t_tien_gt, d.t_tn_tt_nt, d.t_tn_tt, d.t_thue_nt, d.t_thue, d.t_thue_giam_nt, d.t_thue_giam, a.dien_giai from @@table a join #id b on a.stt = b.stt join #unit c on a.ngay_ct = c.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = c.so_ct join ( select stt_rec, sum(tn_ct_nt) as t_tn_ct_nt, sum(tn_ct) as t_tn_ct , sum(tien_gt_nt) as t_tien_gt_nt, sum(tien_gt) as t_tien_gt , sum(tn_tt_nt) as t_tn_tt_nt, sum(tn_tt) as t_tn_tt , sum(thue_nt) as t_thue_nt, sum(thue) as t_thue , sum(thue_giam_nt) as t_thue_giam_nt, sum(thue_giam) as t_thue_giam from #d&Detail; group by stt_rec ) d on b.stt_rec = d.stt_rec update #m&Detail; set ma_thue = isnull(c.ma_thue, ''), thue_suat = isnull(c.thue_suat, 0) from #m&Detail; a left join tdmtn b on a.ma_tn = b.ma_tn left join tdmthuetp c on b.ma_thue_tp = c.ma_thue select top 0 stt_rec, ngay_ct, so_ct, ma_dvcs, status, user_id0, c$, m$, d$, identity(int, 1, 1) as id into #i&Detail; from i&Detail;$000000 insert into #i&Detail; select stt_rec, ngay_ct, so_ct, ma_dvcs, @status, @user, convert(varchar(12), ngay_ct, 112) + so_ct + stt_rec, '#10$' + rtrim(ma_tn) + '#20$' + rtrim(ma_thue), '' from #m&Detail; select @q = dbo.AI_ERP$Function$Update$Inquiry('#i&Detail;', '#d&Detail;', 'd$', 'ma_ns', '#10$', 'stt_rec', default, default, default, default, default) exec sp_executesql @q -- Insert declare @p varchar(32), @insertKey varchar(128), @masterTable varchar(32), @detailTable varchar(32), @inquiryTable varchar(32) select distinct month(ngay_ct) as m, year(ngay_ct) as y into #k from #id select @r = min(y * 12 + m) from #k while @r is not null begin select @m = m, @y = y from #k where y * 12 + m = @r select @p = rtrim(@y) + replace(str(@m, 2), ' ', '0'), @insertKey = 'month(ngay_ct) = ' + rtrim(@m) + ' and year(ngay_ct) = ' + rtrim(@y) select @masterTable = @master + @p, @detailTable = @detail + @p, @inquiryTable = @inquiry + @p select @q = @@inserting(master, @masterTable, @insertKey); exec sp_executesql @q select @q = @@inserting(detail, @detailTable, @insertKey); exec sp_executesql @q select @q = @@inserting(inquiry, @inquiryTable, @insertKey); exec sp_executesql @q -- &ImportOverwriteInsertingByPart; select @r = min(y * 12 + m) from #k where y * 12 + m > @r end @@inserting(general); &ImportOverwriteInserting;
